languages.text: "Если бы ты довела свое "перевоспитание" в Комморре до конца, то могла бы сейчас вкушать свою боль и одиночество словно изысканное явство. Эх. Мы все жалеем об упущенных возможностях слишком поздно, не так ли?"
"If you had committed to your 're-education' in Commorragh, you could be savouring your pain and loneliness like a fine delicacy right now. Ah. We all regret missed opportunities, don't we?"
languages.original_text: "Если бы ты довела свое "перевоспитание" в Комморре до конца, то могла бы сейчас вкушать свою боль и одиночество словно изысканное явство. Эх. Мы все жалеем об упущенных возможностях слишком поздно, не так ли?"

traits.speaker: MarazhaiCompanion

traits.locale_text: "If you had committed to your 're-education' in Commorragh, you could be savouring your pain and loneliness like a fine delicacy right now. Ah. We all regret missed opportunities, don't we?"
traits.speaker: MarazhaiCompanion

languages.text: “如果你之前在科摩罗接受了‘再教育’，现在就可以像品尝美味佳肴一样，细细咀嚼自己的痛苦与孤独了。啊，这实在是太让人遗憾了，你说呢？”
languages.original_text: "If you had committed to your 're-education' in Commorragh, you could be savouring your pain and loneliness like a fine delicacy right now. Ah. We all regret missed opportunities, don't we?"

traits.locale_text: “如果你之前在科摩罗接受了‘再教育’，现在就可以像品尝美味佳肴一样，细细咀嚼自己的痛苦与孤独了。啊，这实在是太让人遗憾了，你说呢？”
traits.speaker: MarazhaiCompanion

languages.text: « Si vous aviez un tant soit peu suivi votre "rééducation" sur Commorragh, vous pourriez vous servir de votre souffrance et de votre solitude comme d'amuse-bouche. Bah. Que d'opportunités manquées, hein ? »
languages.original_text: "If you had committed to your 're-education' in Commorragh, you could be savouring your pain and loneliness like a fine delicacy right now. Ah. We all regret missed opportunities, don't we?"

traits.locale_text: « Si vous aviez un tant soit peu suivi votre "rééducation" sur Commorragh, vous pourriez vous servir de votre souffrance et de votre solitude comme d'amuse-bouche. Bah. Que d'opportunités manquées, hein ? »
traits.speaker: MarazhaiCompanion

languages.text: «Si hubieras aceptado tu reeducación en Commorragh, podrías estar saboreando tu dolor y soledad como un manjar ahora mismo. Ah. Todos nos arrepentimos de las oportunidades perdidas, ¿no?».
languages.original_text: "If you had committed to your 're-education' in Commorragh, you could be savouring your pain and loneliness like a fine delicacy right now. Ah. We all regret missed opportunities, don't we?"

traits.locale_text: «Si hubieras aceptado tu reeducación en Commorragh, podrías estar saboreando tu dolor y soledad como un manjar ahora mismo. Ah. Todos nos arrepentimos de las oportunidades perdidas, ¿no?».
traits.speaker: MarazhaiCompanion

languages.text: 「もしお前がコモラフで”再教育”していたら、今頃お前は自分の痛みと孤独を高級珍味のように味わっていたかもしれない。ああ。チャンスを逃したことは誰しも後悔するものだ。そうだろ？」
languages.original_text: "If you had committed to your 're-education' in Commorragh, you could be savouring your pain and loneliness like a fine delicacy right now. Ah. We all regret missed opportunities, don't we?"

traits.locale_text: 「もしお前がコモラフで”再教育”していたら、今頃お前は自分の痛みと孤独を高級珍味のように味わっていたかもしれない。ああ。チャンスを逃したことは誰しも後悔するものだ。そうだろ？」
traits.speaker: MarazhaiCompanion

languages.text: "Hättet Ihr Euch in Commorragh auf Eure 'Umerziehung' eingelassen, könntet Ihr Euren Schmerz und Eure Einsamkeit nun genießen wie eine edle Delikatesse. Ah. Jeder bereut einmal eine verpasste Gelegenheit, nicht wahr?"
languages.original_text: "If you had committed to your 're-education' in Commorragh, you could be savouring your pain and loneliness like a fine delicacy right now. Ah. We all regret missed opportunities, don't we?"

traits.speaker: MarazhaiCompanion

languages.original_text: "If you had committed to your 're-education' in Commorragh, you could be savouring your pain and loneliness like a fine delicacy right now. Ah. We all regret missed opportunities, don't we?"

languages.text: "Commorragh'ta 'eğitimini' aksatmasaydın şimdi ızdırabın da yalnızlığın da tadına varırdın. Ya... Giden geri gelmiyor, değil mi?"
languages.original_text: "If you had committed to your 're-education' in Commorragh, you could be savouring your pain and loneliness like a fine delicacy right now. Ah. We all regret missed opportunities, don't we?"

traits.locale_text: "Commorragh'da 'eğitimini' aksatmasaydın şimdi ızdırabın da yalnızlığın da tadına varırdın. Ah. Giden geri gelmiyor, değil mi?"
traits.speaker: MarazhaiCompanion
